jd: From: Sonali Gupta, KPG99 sgupta@kpgtech.com Reply to: sgupta@kpgtech.com Hi,Please Read the below Requirement and share your resume and also please let me know your visa status and current Location if interested.DB2 ArchitectLocation: RemoteDuration: 6+ Months No H1B/CPT Skills / Experience Required :​· Proficiency with IBM i (AS/400) Environment, IBM DB2 for i: Experience with DB2, writing queries, stored procedures, and database administration.· SQL Query Writing: Strong knowledge of SQL for querying, managing, and optimizing databases.· Performance Tuning: Experience in optimizing SQL queries for better performance, especially for complex data sets.· SQL Procedures and Functions: Writing and maintaining stored procedures, triggers, and user-defined functions.· Data Modeling, Data Structures and DB Design.
